sentences.sContent: ...You have to wait for the speaker to deliver quite a chunk of language...
...you're going to be wrong a good chunk of the time...
...a guidebook to how a large and ever-growing chunk of humanity chooses to live...
...A stated goal of the Obama administration is to restore a big chunk of this employment...

remMethod.val: “常客” → 饭馆的常客占客人的一大部分 → 相当大的部分

trans.tranCn: 厚片， 大块； 相当大的部分
trans.tranOther: a large thick piece of something that does not have an even shape
